Asset.Item: Electrodes: Gives high volt shock. Keep the Atooms away
pH Scale: it can set acidity of Atooms
Funnel: it can filter down the Atooms
Test Tube: Hold few Atooms but very useful
Conical Flask: "broad base narrow neck" flask
Measuring Cylinder: measure cubic centimeters of Atooms
Beaker: it can hold tons of Atooms
